about_the_game:
What would you do if you were trapped in a dimension of seemingly endless rooms that went on for eternity? Based on the backrooms lore, this first person, walking simulator will take you on a 2 hour eerie adventure through a place that only exists in our nightmares. "The Backrooms: Forsaken" takes this concept one step further by introducing a companion character and full story to raise the stakes. If you're looking for a casual game this spooky season, then "The Backrooms: Forsaken" is for you.

What to expect:
-First person point of view
-Eerie situations and scary moments
-Single player campaign
-About 2 hours of gameplay

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit).
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 3 1200 / Intel Core i5-7500
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 560 with 4GB VRAM / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti with 4GB VRAM
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: *You will have to change settings manually in Menu* Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Estimated performance (when set to Prioritize Performance): 1080p/45fps. ・Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. ・AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 required to support ray tracing.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)/Windows 11 (64 bit)
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 / Intel Core i7 8700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 5700 / NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system. Estimated performance: 1080p/60fps ・Framerate might drop in graphics-intensive scenes. ・AMD Radeon RX 6700 XT or NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2070 required to support ray tracing.
